original: ekaṁ samayaṁ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
analyzed: ekam samayam aññataraḥ bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmim vana saṇḍe

original: Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu divāvihāragato pāpake akusale vitakke vitakketi gehanissite.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena saḥ bhikkhu divāvihāra gataḥ pāpake akusale vitakke vitakketi geha nissite

original: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno anukampikā atthakāmā
analyzed: atha kho yā tasmin vana saṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhunaḥ anukampikā attha kāmā

original: taṁ bhikkhuṁ saṁvejetukāmā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
analyzed: tam bhikkhum savejetu kāmā yena saḥ bhikkhu tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā tam bhikkhum gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi

original: Atha kho so bhikkhu tāya devatāya saṁvejito saṁvegamāpādīti.
analyzed: atha kho so bhikkhu tāya devatāya savejitaḥ sa vegam āpādi iti

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
analyzed: ekam samayam aññataraḥ bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmim vana saṇḍe

original: Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu divāvihāragato supati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena saḥ bhikkhu divāvihāra gataḥ supati

original: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno anukampikā atthakāmā
analyzed: atha kho yā tasmin vana saṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhunaḥ anukampikā attha kāmā

original: taṁ bhikkhuṁ saṁvejetukāmā yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
analyzed: tam bhikkhum savejetu kāmā yena saḥ bhikkhu tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā tam bhikkhum gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā kassapagotto kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
analyzed: ekam samayam āyasmā kassapa gotto kosalesu viharati aññatarasmim vana saṇḍe

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā kassapagotto divāvihāragato aññataraṁ chetaṁ ovadati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmā kassapa gottaḥ divāvihāra gataḥ aññataram chetam ovadati

original: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā āyasmantaṁ kassapagottaṁ saṁvejetukāmā
analyzed: atha kho yā tasmin vana saṇḍe adhivatthā devatā āyasmantam kassapa gottam savejetu kāmā

original: yenāyasmā kassapagotto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ kassapagottaṁ gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi:
analyzed: yena āyasmā kassapa gotto tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam kassapa gottam gāthāhi ajjhabhāsi
cakkhu hi ssa na vijjati iti

original: Atha kho āyasmā kassapagotto tāya devatāya saṁvejito saṁvegamāpādīti.
analyzed: atha kho āyasmā kassapa gotto tāya devatāya sa vejitaḥ sa vegam āpādi iti

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ sambahulā bhikkhū kosalesu viharanti aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
analyzed: ekam samayam sambahulāḥ bhikkhū kosalesu viharanti aññatarasmim vana saṇḍe

original: Atha kho te bhikkhū vassaṁvuṭṭhā temāsaccayena cārikaṁ pakkamiṁsu.
analyzed: atha kho te bhikkhū vassa vuṭṭhāḥ temāsa cayena cārikam pakkamisu

original: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā te bhikkhū apassantī paridevamānā tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:
analyzed: atha kho yā tasmin vana saṇḍe adhivatthā devatā te bhikkhū a passantī paridevamānā tā ayam velāyam imam gātham abhāsi

original: Evaṁ vutte, aññatarā devatā taṁ devataṁ gāthāya paccabhāsi:
analyzed: evam vutte aññatarā devatā tam devatam gāthāya paccabhāsi

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā ānando kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
analyzed: ekam samayam āyasmai ānando kosalesu viharati aññatarasmim vana saṇḍe

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā ānando ativelaṁ gihisaññattibahulo viharati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena āyasmai ānandaḥ ativelam gihi saññatti bahulaḥ viharati

original: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā āyasmato ānandassa anukampikā atthakāmā
analyzed: atha kho yā tasmin vana saṇḍe adhivatthā devatā āyasmataḥ ānandassa anukampikā attha kāmā

original: āyasmantaṁ ānandaṁ saṁvejetukāmā yenāyasmā ānando tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ
analyzed: āyasmantam ānandam yena āyasmai ānando tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā

original: Atha kho āyasmā ānando tāya devatāya saṁvejito saṁvegamāpādīti.
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmai ānandaḥ tāya devatāya savejitaḥ sa vegam āpādi iti

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā anuruddho kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
analyzed: ekam samayam āyasmā anuruddho kosalesu viharati aññatarasmim vana saṇḍe

original: Atha kho aññatarā tāvatiṁsakāyikā devatā jālinī nāma āyasmato anuruddhassa purāṇadutiyikā yenāyasmā anuruddho tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantaṁ anuruddhaṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:
analyzed: atha kho aññatarā tāvati sa kāyikā devatā jālinī nāma āyasmataḥ anuruddhassa purāṇa dutiyikā yena āyasmai anuruddhaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā āyasmantam anuruddham gāthāya ajjhabhāsi

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ āyasmā nāgadatto kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
analyzed: ekam samayam āyasmā nāgadatto kosalesu viharati aññatarasmim vana saṇḍe

original: Tena kho pana samayena āyasmā nāgadatto atikālena gāmaṁ pavisati, atidivā paṭikkamati.
analyzed: tena khalu pana samayena āyasmā nāgadattaḥ atikālena gāmam pavisati atidivā paṭikkamati

original: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā āyasmato nāgadattassa anukampikā atthakāmā
analyzed: atha kho yā tasmin vana saṇḍe adhivatthā devatā āyasmataḥ nāgadattassa anukampikā attha kāmā

original: āyasmantaṁ nāgadattaṁ saṁvejetukāmā yenāyasmā nāgadatto tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā
analyzed: āyasmantam nāgadattam yena āyasmā nāgadattaḥ tena upasaṅkami upasaṅkamitvā

original: Atha kho āyasmā nāgadatto tāya devatāya saṁvejito saṁvegamāpādīti.
analyzed: atha khalu āyasmā nāgadattaḥ tāya devatāya sa vejitaḥ sa vegam āpādi iti

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ aññataro bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
analyzed: ekam samayam aññataraḥ bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmim vana saṇḍe

original: Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu aññatarasmiṁ kule ativelaṁ ajjhogāḷhappatto viharati.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena saḥ bhikkhu aññatarasmim kule ativelam ajjhogāḷhappattaḥ viharati

original: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno anukampikā atthakāmā
analyzed: atha kho yā tasmin vana saṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhunaḥ anukampikā attha kāmā

original: taṁ bhikkhuṁ saṁvejetukāmā yā tasmiṁ kule kulagharaṇī, tassā vaṇṇaṁ abhinimminitvā
analyzed: tam bhikkhum savejetu kāmā yā tasmim kule kula gharaṇī tassāḥ vaṇṇam abhinimminitvā

original: yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:

original: Ekaṁ samayaṁ aññataro vajjiputtako bhikkhu vesāliyaṁ viharati aññatarasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe.
analyzed: ekam samayam aññataraḥ vajjiputtakaḥ bhikkhu vesāliyam viharati aññatarasmim vana saṇḍe

original: Tena kho pana samayena vesāliyaṁ vajjiputtako sabbaratticāro hoti.
analyzed: tena kho pana samayena vesāliyam vajjiputtako sabba ratti cāraḥ hoti

original: Atha kho so bhikkhu vesāliyā tūriyatāḷitavāditanigghosasaddaṁ sutvā paridevamāno tāyaṁ velāyaṁ imaṁ gāthaṁ abhāsi:

original: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno anukampikā atthakāmā

analyzed: ekam samayam aññataraḥ bhikkhu kosalesu viharati aññatarasmim vana saṇḍe

original: Tena kho pana samayena so bhikkhu yaṁ sudaṁ pubbe ativelaṁ sajjhāyabahulo viharati so aparena samayena appossukko tuṇhībhūto saṅkasāyati.

original: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tassa bhikkhuno dhammaṁ asuṇantī yena so bhikkhu tenupasaṅkami; upasaṅkamitvā taṁ bhikkhuṁ gāthāya ajjhabhāsi:

original: Atha kho yā tasmiṁ vanasaṇḍe adhivatthā devatā tesaṁ bhikkhūnaṁ anukampikā atthakāmā
